original_text: But instead, your sins have stopped these good things. You have not received God's blessing. But instead, your sins have stopped these good things.
korean_text: 너희 허물이 이러한 일들을 물리쳤고 너희 죄가 너희로부터 좋은 것을 막았느니라

sentences.original_text: your sins have stopped these good things
sentences.korean_translation: 너희의 죄가 이 좋은 것들을 막았다

sentences.original_text: You have not received God's blessing
your sins have stopped these good things
sentences.korean_translation: 너희의 죄가 이 좋은 것들을 막았다
